snippet: With Iran's opposition leaders under house arrest and their followers calling for a boycott of the first election since 2009, state-run news sources reported enthusiastic voters and record turnout.
abstract: With Iran's opposition leaders under house arrest and their followers calling for a boycott of the first election since 2009, state-run news sources reported enthusiastic voters and record turnout.

headline.main: Iranian News Media Portray Elections as a Blow to the U.S.
